=Caffeine - Go Markup Bullets=

Approaches to parsing nested markup like bullets, numbered lists and indented code.

==Nested Grammar==

  # Use a itemize_regex to convert code into individual items.
  # Use a depth_regex to find depth of each item
  # Use a nest_html to determine the nesting html (e.g. "&lt;ul&gt;$1&lt;/ul&gt;"
  # Use a item_html to determine the item html (e.g. "&lt;li&gt;$1&lt;/li&gt;"

Weaknesses

  * Need two grammars
  * Can't handle different bullets
